abstract: Kielder Marathon third-place finisher Rob Sloan is disqualified after leaving 20 miles in, taking a shuttle bus and emerging from the woods near the finish line.
snippet: The third-place finisher in the Kielder Marathon on Sunday near Newcastle, England, Rob Sloan, was disqualified after leaving the race 20 miles in, taking a spectator shuttle bus, and emerging from the woods near the finish.
lead_paragraph: The third-place finisher in the Kielder Marathon on Sunday near Newcastle, England, Rob Sloan, was disqualified after leaving the race 20 miles in, taking a spectator shuttle bus, and emerging from the woods near the finish.
